nodes.text: The palace of Grakkus the Hutt, was located in Hutta Town on the moon Nar Shaddaa and contained numerous relics that once belonged to the Jedi Order. During his time on Nar Shaddaa, Jedi hopeful Luke Skywalker was captured by Grakkus and brought to his palace in order to open the Jedi holocrons contained within it. Grakkus kept Skywalker in his custody so the boy could fight an arena match against Kongo the Disemboweler in Grakkus Arena, who Grakkus believed would triumph—allowing the Hutt to bill the fight as the death of the last Jedi. Skywalker later fought in the arena against Kongo.
